attributes.action: To ban all use of non-ECO-friendly materials in schools and Offices
attributes.additional_details: Because if anyone has the power to put down some ground rules its our government
attributes.background: To make Laws and ground rules and stick with them

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the use of certain materials in schools and offices, however it's not clear how you want 'non-eco-friendly' to be defined. This means it's not clear which specific kinds of 'materials' you want to be banned.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

‘Ban All Single Use Plastics and Plastic Packaging to Save Our Planet’: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607466 
‘Ban all plastic packaging’: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603901 
‘Stop schools selling or giving students single-use plastic water bottles’: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604318
